code: import React from"react";import{Navigate,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,requiredRole}=_ref;const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const userRole=localStorage.getItem("role");const location=useLocation();if(!token){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/",state:{from:location},replace:true});}if(requiredRole&&userRole!==requiredRole&&userRole!=="admin"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/stats",replace:true});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:children});};export default ProtectedRoute;
